context_of_use: The customer wants to add products to their cart and complete the checkout process to place orders.
stakeholders_and_interests: customer: wants to purchase multiple items conveniently
description: Support adding products to a cart and completing checkout to place orders.
preconditions: Customer is logged into their account.
Customer has selected products to purchase.
postconditions: Customer receives confirmation of the order.
requirements_met: The system shall allow customers to add products to their cart.
The system shall support multiple payment methods during checkout.
outstanding_issues: Need to define payment method options.
main_flow: 1. Customer adds product to cart → System updates cart with the selected product.
2. Customer proceeds to checkout → System displays checkout options.
3. Customer selects payment method → System processes payment.
4. Customer confirms order → System places the order and sends confirmation.
exception_flows: EF-1 (from Step 3): If payment fails, System notifies customer and prompts for a different payment method.
